Check_Description: Verify ontological separation between KDB and IDB directories
Pass_Criteria: Zero overlap between KDB (GENESIS + SSOT) and IDB (PUB) paths

Check_Description: Verify all authoritative knowledge resides in KDB
Pass_Criteria: 100% of technical knowledge artifacts found in GENESIS or SSOT
Notes: No authoritative content should exist in PUB/IDB only

Check_Description: Verify IDB artifacts are generated (not authored)
Pass_Criteria: IDB directories have read-only access; no direct authoring detected
Notes: Check file permissions and commit history

Check_Description: Verify KDB precedence in conflict resolution
Pass_Criteria: All conflict resolution records show KDB update before IDB regeneration

Check_Description: Verify no regression from IDB to KDB
Pass_Criteria: Zero instances of IDB-to-KDB content flow detected

Check_Description: Verify all KDBâ†’IDB flows have contracts
Pass_Criteria: 100% of IDB artifacts reference valid contracts
Notes: Cross-reference IDB artifacts with contract registry

Check_Description: Verify mandatory traceability for all IDB artifacts
Pass_Criteria: 100% of IDB artifacts have kdb_sources and contract_id metadata

Check_Description: Verify maturity gate enforcement
Pass_Criteria: Maturity checks present in all IDB generation pipelines

Check_Description: Verify audit trail retention
Pass_Criteria: All transformations logged with timestamps; retention policy enforced
Notes: Check log completeness and storage duration

Check_Description: Verify KNOT registration for all KNUs
Pass_Criteria: 100% of SSOT KNUs have valid parent KNOT references

Check_Description: Verify GENESIS resolution before SSOT execution
Pass_Criteria: All LC02+ KNUs created after corresponding LC01 KNOT

Check_Description: Verify SSOT asset declaration completeness
Pass_Criteria: 100% of KNUs have LC category + parent KNOT + maturity + downstream targets

Check_Description: Verify no direct KDB publication
Pass_Criteria: Zero direct user access to KDB; no external links to SSOT/GENESIS
Notes: Check web server configs and external links

Check_Description: Verify mandatory KDB reference for all IDB artifacts
Pass_Criteria: 100% of IDB artifacts reference KDB sources and contract
Notes: Parse IDB metadata for kdb_sources field

Check_Description: Verify no new knowledge in IDB
Pass_Criteria: Zero instances of IDB content without KDB source

Check_Description: Verify IDB organization by process/audience
Pass_Criteria: 100% of IDB artifacts tagged with audience + process
Notes: Check for audience and process tags

Check_Description: Verify supported projection types
Pass_Criteria: All IDB artifacts are CSDB or EXPORT or IETP format

Check_Description: Verify contract content completeness
Pass_Criteria: 100% of contracts pass YAML schema validation (9 required sections)

Check_Description: Verify baseline anchoring for releases
Pass_Criteria: 100% of released IDB artifacts reference frozen KDB baseline

Check_Description: Verify audit evidence retention
Pass_Criteria: All evidence stored per retention policy (7 years)
Notes: Check evidence storage location and timestamps
